title: DV360 Adapter Params
description: A schema which validates params accepted by the DV360 adapter

reward.description: An integer defining the reward (skip) from DV360

region.description: A string defining region for choosing the closest DV360 endpoint

mraid_supported.description: A bool config to determine if MRAID is supported by DV360

skadn_supported.description: A bool config to determine if SKADN is supported by DV360
